description: The Windows Server 2012 and 2012 R2 ESU program is designed to provide extended security updates for these operating systems. It focuses on providing monthly rollup packages to ensure that systems remain secure and compliant. Importantly, security-only update packages are not included in this program, which necessitates careful planning and management of updates. This tool is essential for organizations relying on Windows Server 2012 and R2, allowing them to maintain their environments securely post end-of-support. It emphasizes the necessity of understanding the available updates and the limitations of the ESU program (LLM Synthesized).
